product_name: The North Face Surge II Charged Daypack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Surge II Charged Daypack for women has a built-in power supply, laptop sleeve and room for clothes so you can travel overnight and keep your mobile devices charged.
short_description: The North Face Surge II Charged Daypack for women has a built-in power supply, laptop sleeve and room for clothes so you can travel overnight and keep your mobile devices charged.
